resources.string: Или войдите через любимую соцю сеть
Используя приложение IWMY вы соглашаетесь с условиями использования и политикой конфиденциальности
User already exists. Please enter other email or username
Connection error! Please check your internet connection and try again.
You are not authorized. Please try to logout and login again.
You do not have permission to proceed with this action.
This action is no longer supported. Please update your application.
This action resulted in an error. Please try again later.
No such user or incorrect password
Please check your inputs and try again.
Please select equal number of guys and ladies.
You cannot add ratings for this user
Tap photo if you want to rotate it
No such user, or too many attempts to remind password. Please contact us by email.
Your password is sent to your email.
Введите ваш емеил и мы отправил вам информацию о востановлении пароля

string-array.name: tutorial_text
string-array.item: "Горизонтальная прокрутка экранов — удобная и модная вещь."
"Использовать эту библиотеку можно для версий Android 1.6 и старше. Конкретно нам понадобятся классы ViewPager и PagerAdapter."
"Как видно из примера, использовать ViewPager и PagerAdapter достаточно легко."

resources.string: Your IWMY Speed Dating account was confirmed
Thank you for participating in the speed dating!

Your request for registering your IWMY Speed Dating account as an organizer was satisfied! Now you can create and edit events using your device. We hope our app will become an effective discovery for you! If you have any questions regarding the app or collaboration, feel free to write an email to us, we will answer shortly: 
CONTACTS_SPEED_DATING 
 
Best regards, 
The IWMY team

The dating was successful. The number of matching couples: COUPLE_COUNT. Contacts of matching couples: 
 
CONTACTS_COUPLE_LIST 
 
Thank you for using our application! Our contact info: CONTACTS_SPEED_DATING

At the speed dating you and one of the participants made a couple! It's time to know each other better! Congratulations! Their contact info: 
 
CONTACTS_ONE_COUPLE 
 
Thank you for participation! 
 
Organizer's contact info: 
CONTACTS_ORGANIZER 
 
Our contact info: 
CONTACTS_SPEED_DATING

At the speed dating COUPLE_COUNT people liked you! It's time to know each other better! Our congratulations! Their contact info: 
 
CONTACTS_MANY_COUPLES 
 
Thank you for participation! 
 
Organizer's contact info: 
CONTACTS_ORGANIZER 
 
Our contact info: 
CONTACTS_SPEED_DATING

Thank you for attending our event. We hope you had good time there! Unfortunately, this time reciprocity wasn't achieved, but it will be all right. 
 
We are gladly waiting for you at the next dating! Luck will be with you! 
 
Organizer's contact info: 
CONTACTS_ORGANIZER 
 
Our contact info: 
CONTACTS_SPEED_DATING

Password reminding was requested for your account at IWMY Speed Dating. 
 
Your password is 
PASSWORD 
 
If it was not you, please contact us.
